nodes.bodyText: can the ResourceInfo param be removed?

ResourceInfo cannot be removed because it includes information about the resource reference lookup that will be needed by the extension point. One example is that CommonJ has some requirements around the sharing attribute.
Instead of re-declaring the service reference set/unset methods, you can set -dsannotations-inherit: true in the bnd.bnd

Nice, I'll look into switching to that option for this and some other pre-existing attributes that were following this pattern.  I'll make that improvement in a separate pull because this already has a successful build with all tests passing.
